Public Member Functions

Initialization

(id) - initWithCGColor:
 Initializes a newly allocated CPColor object with the provided CGColorRef.
(id) - initWithComponentRed:green:blue:alpha:
 Initializes a newly allocated CPColor object with the provided RGBA color components.
(CPColor *) - colorWithAlphaComponent:
 Creates and returns a new CPColor instance having color components identical to the current object but having the provided alpha component.

 Returns a shared instance of CPColor initialized with a fully transparent color.
